'to chat!', 'WELCOME TO LUXURY, WELCOME TO CENTRO', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 657 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Situated in the tranquil, tree-lined Village East Neighborhood in the vibrant On Havana Street district, Centro is the ideal place to come home to.', 'Just minutes from the Denver Tech Center, Cherry Creek and Lowry, this garden-style apartment community is accented with open-air plazas, beautifully planned green spaces and amenities you soon won’t be able to live without.', 'Easy access to Denver makes commuting a breeze, but don’t worry about having to go far for shopping and dining.', 'An abundance of stores and restaurants, including Sprouts Farmers Market, SuperTarget, Petco, Starbucks, Noodles & Co., and more, are within walking distance.', 'Plus, we’re in the Cherry Creek School District — one of the highest-achieving school districts in the state.', 'Centro offers one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans, and custom two-level townhome-style apartments with attached garages.', 'Our apartment homes boast eco-friendly designs accented by elevated finishes, such as granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, wood-style flooring and extra-deep sinks.', 'Centro residents enjoy our luxe community amenities, including a well-appointed fitness center, decadent resort-style pool, custom fire pits and convenient grilling stations.', 'Come home to Centro.', 'Features', '- Designer 42" slab style cabinetry with contemporary bar pulls', '- Extra deep sink with disposal', '- Private balconies and patios with storage closet Balconies with exterior
